title: YSP-2700 MusicCast Sound Bar with Wireless Subwoofer
description:
Stunning Sound Realism, Powerful Wireless Streaming
Immerse yourself in true 7.1-channel surround sound from an ultra-slim sound bar. The YSP-2700 features Yamaha proprietary Digital Sound Projector technology with 16 speakers powered by 16 amplifiers delivering lifelike sound with remarkable presence, detail and clarity. Dolby® TrueHD and DTS-HD Master Audio™ provide high-definition audio processing.
